name: Paper Problems
description:
Paper Problems is a choose your own adventure game about accepting our inability to change the past with our worry. The player will experience three events of their life and get the chance to rewrite the memories in their diary. 

The player will experience the positive or negative consequences of their revisions and watch the scene play out as they reimagine it.

TO PLAY ON WINDOWS: Extract all and then run .exe

TO PLAY ON MAC: After attempting to launch go to System Preferences, click Security & Privacy , then click General, a message should appearing asking if the game can run.

CONTROLS:

Go through text with no arrow - space bar/enter/return

When red circle appears - space bar/enter/return

Move around - arrow keys

Pick text boxes - click with mouse on the buttons
